name: Duck! (Ultimio)
description:
Duck! is a Platformer/Boss-Fight created in 3 days.

You have to help the duck to reclaim is eggs from the fox.

Control :

Left/Right ArrowKey = move

Up ArrowKey= Jump

Hold Up to glide

Right ArrowKey to pass dialogue

Credits

  Ultimio (Manuel Loiseau) : Development & Game/Level design

  Cypres : Pixel-Art, Sound Design &   Game/Level design

  NezumyArt : Background (Non-pixel art illustration)

  xDeviruchi (Marllon Silva) : Music ( https://www.youtube.com/c/xDeviruchi )

Share your best time (or your opinion) in comments section !
